Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or citations to support the attribution of the quote to Benjamin Franklin.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no documented usage of the quote by Benjamin Franklin.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance and prevalence of the quote by attributing it to Benjamin Franklin without proper evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Benjamin Franklin said the quote without providing substantial proof or historical documentation.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert presents an alternative explanation by attributing the quote to Timothy Leary, suggesting that Leary may have derived his version of the phrase from Franklin.
